column4: tasks (row number of the `Tasks` spreadsheet, separate by comma)

column3: Prepare yourself mentally and work with your partner to decide how to make your dreams happen.
Make an easy and delightful day for your guests.
Take a breathe. It's time to surprise your partner.
It is the moment to say "I Do"s and exchange wedding bands.
Toasts, dances, entertainments and cake cutting...Yes, the party begins!
Extend the happiest moments with friends and loved ones.
Unwind and enjoy your newlywed status.

column24: Buy formalwear extras (like pocket squares, bow ties, and ties)
